text: I am going to step down as CEO of @TRF in April and the excellent Antonio Zappulla will become the new CEO when I leave. My 11 years at the Foundation have been a story of growth and impact. Please see the press release for more information://t.co/9qmNcJYsWY//t.co/7vUyQIlKK5

name: Monique Villa
text: I sat down with the CEO of @TRF_Stories @Monique_Villa to talk about modern-day slavery and the role corporations can play to end it, @TRTWorldRC//t.co/TNyZzy0uzW

name: Monique Villa
text: Shirin Ebadi: "There should be the rule of law in these cases. Nazanin is innocent and according to the law she must be released there should be no connection between Iranian requests in other areas and Nazanin's case." #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: Shirin Ebadi: "Nazanin has never worked with the Iranian authorities. The purpose of her journey was to see her family for a few days." And her work at the Foundation has never touched Iran in any way. I call on those responsible to free her now. #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: Shirin Ebadi states emphatically: Nazanin is innocent and she is only a hostage. And the whole world should know the nature of the Iranian authorities. #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: Shirin Ebadi: "They have taken a hunger strike as a last option ... the purpose of this press conference today is to attract the international community's attention to the dangers that Iran's political prisoners are facing." #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: Richard: "I think in the first week she was interrogated and asked to cooperate. We went public, they moved her and from June 2016, this tragedy seems to be them using her as a bargaining chip. #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: It's a worrying situation when you see the effect of the trauma Nazanin that has faced over three years, anything added now is enormous and frightening. #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: Richard Ratcliffe on this ordeal with Iran's authorities: One of the most ominous parts was the pressures on Nazanin's family. That's one of the reasons we made these things public to stop them playing with us. #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: Shirin: No lawful reason is given for arrest in Iran. "The victim is isolated and put under pressure, and finally they force them to confess to whatever they would like to hear." Richard: All of this mechanism is about controlling and scaring someone. #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: Shirin Ebadi told me before the press conference that there are 37 dual nationals detained in Iran today. #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: Richard Ratcliffe: Almost the most important thing a country can do is visit their own citizens and check that they're ok #FreeNazanin

name: Monique Villa
text: I am giving a press conference with Richard Ratcliffe and Shirin Ebadi about Nazanin's hunger strike. She has been denied medical treatment in Evin prison and I call for her to be released immediately and provided care for her physical and mental health. #FreeNazanin//t.co/8inYp4UfWL
